Text: The UB40 File is a compilation album of all of UB40's 1980 Graduate recordings.
Triplets:<The UB40 File
1:
--------------------
Text: The UB40 File:  The album first appeared as a double vinyl LP in 1985 and features all the tracks from "Signing Off" on Record One, the 3 tracks from the 12" single that accompanied "Signing Off" on the first side of Record Two with the tracks released as singles that didn't feature on the debut album on side 2.
Triplets: <UB40 File
